query.name: get_all_assets2
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id, (uplink_locations.name) as location_address_name, uplink_locations.location_address_id
FROM (uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type, uplink_locations)
LEFT JOIN uplink_location_equipment ON (uplink_locations.location_address_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id)
WHERE uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment.account_id = ? AND uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_id AND uplink_locations.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment_type.deletion_datetime > ? ORDER BY uplink_locations.name, uplink_equipment_type.name
